<a id="AudioEffectStereoEnhance"></a>

# AudioEffectStereoEnhance

**Inherits:** [AudioEffect](AudioEffect.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

An audio effect that can be used to adjust the intensity of stereo panning.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

An audio effect that can be used to adjust the intensity of stereo panning.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="AudioEffectStereoEnhance_property_pan_pullout"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **pan_pullout** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectStereoEnhance_property_pan_pullout)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_pan_pullout**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_pan_pullout**\ (\ )

Amplifies the difference between stereo channels, increasing or decreasing existing panning. A value of 0.0 will downmix stereo to mono. Does not affect a mono signal.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectStereoEnhance_property_surround"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **surround** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectStereoEnhance_property_surround)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_surround**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_surround**\ (\ )

Widens sound stage through phase shifting in conjunction with [time_pullout_ms](AudioEffectStereoEnhance.md#AudioEffectStereoEnhance_property_time_pullout_ms). Just pans sound to the left channel if [time_pullout_ms](AudioEffectStereoEnhance.md#AudioEffectStereoEnhance_property_time_pullout_ms) is 0.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectStereoEnhance_property_time_pullout_ms"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **time_pullout_ms** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectStereoEnhance_property_time_pullout_ms)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_time_pullout**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_time_pullout**\ (\ )

Widens sound stage through phase shifting in conjunction with [surround](AudioEffectStereoEnhance.md#AudioEffectStereoEnhance_property_surround). Just delays the right channel if [surround](AudioEffectStereoEnhance.md#AudioEffectStereoEnhance_property_surround) is 0.
